cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on February 16, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3540, Chesapeake Bay Science, Education, and Ecosystem Enhancement Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 91 (Tuesday, May 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SARBANES:
H.R. 3540.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution under the
General Welfare Clause
[Page H2668]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 414.

title: Chesapeake Bay Science, Education, and Ecosystem Enhancement Act of 2021
